data.comment: In the minute 0, The match goes to penalties!
Osvaldo Alonso (Minnesota) scores from the penalty spot.
Fanendo Adi (Columbus) scores!
In the minute 0, Jan Gregus (Minnesota) succeeds from the penalty spot.
Pedro Santos (Columbus) converts his penalty!
Aaron Schoenfeld (Minnesota) succeeds from the penalty spot.
In the minute 0, Chris Cadden (Columbus) misses his penalty attempt!
Raheem Edwards (Minnesota) converts his penalty!
Lucas Zelarrayan (Columbus) scores from the penalty spot.
In the minute 0, Chase Gasper (Minnesota) scores!
The penalty shootout is over. The final score is 3-5.
The first-half is just kicking off.
Throw-in Minnesota.
In the minute 1, Minnesota awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Allen Chapman signals a free kick to Minnesota.
Throw-in for Columbus at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex.
In the minute 2, Minnesota to take a throw-in in Columbus territory.
Can Columbus capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Minnesota's half?
Ball safe as Minnesota is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 5, Columbus advance rapidly upfield but Allen Chapman blows for offside.
Can Columbus get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Minnesota's half?
In Orlando, Minnesota push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 7, Columbus awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Columbus in their own half.
Columbus have a goal kick.
In the minute 9, Allen Chapman signals a free kick to Columbus in their own half.
Allen Chapman signals a Minnesota throw-in in Columbus's half.
Allen Chapman signals a Minnesota throw-in in Columbus's half.
In the minute 10, Throw-in Columbus.
Minnesota to take a throw-in in Columbus territory.
Can Minnesota get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Columbus's half?
In the minute 11, Luis Amarilla of Minnesota gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Columbus at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex.
Throw-in for Columbus in their own half.
In the minute 13, Free kick Columbus.
In Orlando Columbus attack through Lucas Zelarrayan. The finish is off target, however.
Allen Chapman awards Minnesota a goal kick.
In the minute 14, Minnesota awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball safe as Columbus is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Corner awarded to Columbus.
In the minute 16, Jonathan Mensah (Columbus) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Ball goes out of play for a Minnesota goal kick.
Allen Chapman signals a throw-in for Minnesota, close to Columbus's area.
In the minute 18, Minnesota have been awarded a corner by Allen Chapman.
Robin Lod is on target to give Minnesota a 0-1 advantage.
Jose Aja with an assist there.
In the minute 19, Can Minnesota get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Columbus's half?
Allen Chapman signals a free kick to Columbus in their own half.
Throw-in for Columbus at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex.
In the minute 24, Allen Chapman signals a free kick to Columbus.
Goal kick for Minnesota at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex.
Columbus awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 26, Free kick Columbus.
Columbus push forward at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex and Harrison Afful gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Minnesota defence.
Ball safe as Minnesota is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 30, Columbus to take a throw-in in Minnesota territory.
Minnesota have a goal kick.
Allen Chapman signals a Columbus throw-in in Minnesota's half.
In the minute 34, Luis Diaz gets his shot on target but fails to score for Columbus.
Minnesota have been awarded a corner by Allen Chapman.
Columbus awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 38, Minnesota awarded a free kick in their own half.
Columbus's Luis Diaz misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Minnesota goal kick.
In the minute 39, Minnesota are whistled for offside.
Allen Chapman awards Columbus a goal kick.
Goal kick for Columbus at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex.
In the minute 41, Allen Chapman signals a free kick to Minnesota in their own half.
Throw-in Minnesota.
Minnesota have a goal kick.
In the minute 43, Allen Chapman signals a Minnesota throw-in in Columbus's half.
Corner awarded to Minnesota.
Minnesota's Robin Lod gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 44, Ball goes out of play for a Columbus goal kick.
Minnesota awarded a free kick in their own half.
2 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Orlando.
In the minute 45, Minnesota are pushing forward but Robin Lod's finish is wide of the goal.
Allen Chapman awards Columbus a goal kick.
Luis Amarilla for Minnesota gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 45, Columbus have a goal kick.
The first-half has ended.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, Columbus make their first substitution with Derrick Etienne replacing Luis Diaz.
Allen Chapman signals a free kick to Minnesota in their own half.
Can Minnesota get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Columbus's half?
In the minute 49, Free kick Columbus.
Derrick Etienne (Columbus) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Columbus to take a throw-in in Minnesota territory.
In the minute 52, Columbus are coming forward and Lucas Zelarrayan gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Minnesota goal kick.
Throw-in for Columbus close to the penalty box.
In the minute 54, Minnesota's Ethan Finlay is on target but unsuccessful.
Minnesota have been awarded a corner by Allen Chapman.
Ethan Finlay (Minnesota) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
In the minute 55, Minnesota have a dangerous throw-in.
Minnesota to take a throw-in in Columbus territory.
Throw-in for Columbus at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex.
In the minute 58, Columbus's Harrison Afful misses with an attempt on goal.
Allen Chapman awards Minnesota a goal kick.
Allen Chapman signals a Columbus throw-in in Minnesota's half.
In the minute 61, Corner awarded to Columbus.
Columbus drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Throw-in for Columbus in their own half.
In the minute 63, Columbus's Artur gets in a shot on goal at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Minnesota awarded a free kick in their own half.
Caleb Porter (Columbus) is making a second substitution, with Hector Jimenez replacing Milton Valenzuela.
In the minute 64, Adrian Heath is making the team's first substitution at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex with Jacori Hayes replacing Hassani Dotson.
Important block from the Columbus defence as Jan Gregus fires in a strike for Minnesota.
Can Minnesota get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Columbus's half?
In the minute 68, Columbus awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Romain Metanire is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
In Orlando, Lucas Zelarrayan of Columbus is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 72, Ball safe as Columbus is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Adrian Heath (Minnesota) has taken off Romain Metanire who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Marlon Hairston is the replacement.
Corner awarded to Columbus.
In the minute 74, Goal kick for Minnesota at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex.
Columbus to take a throw-in in Minnesota territory.
Throw-in for Columbus at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex.
In the minute 76, Chris Cadden is on a sub for Darlington Nagbe for Columbus.
Allen Chapman awards Minnesota a goal kick.
In the minute 78, Minnesota needs to be cautious. Columbus have an attacking throw-in.
Adrian Heath (Minnesota) is making a fourth substitution, with Raheem Edwards replacing Robin Lod.
Aaron Schoenfeld is replacing Luis Amarilla for Minnesota at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex.
Columbus have been given a penalty at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex...
In the minute 79, Gyasi Zardes (Columbus) has missed a penalty!
Gyasi Zardes levels the score at 1-1.
Jan Gregus of Minnesota gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 80, Columbus have a goal kick.
Ball goes out of play for a Minnesota goal kick.
Columbus make their fourth substitution with Fanendo Adi replacing Gyasi Zardes.
In the minute 84, Allen Chapman signals a Columbus throw-in in Minnesota's half.
Allen Chapman signals a free kick to Minnesota.
Jonathan Mensah (Columbus) has received a yellow card from Allen Chapman.
In the minute 85, In Orlando Minnesota drive forward through Jan Gregus. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Free kick Columbus.
Columbus are coming forward and Pedro Santos gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 86, Goal kick for Minnesota at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex.
Minnesota's Raheem Edwards breaks free at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Columbus at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex.
In the minute 88, Can Columbus capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Minnesota's half?
Throw-in for Minnesota in their own half.
Allen Chapman will wait an extra 3 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Columbus have been awarded a corner by Allen Chapman.
Allen Chapman signals a free kick to Minnesota in their own half.
Minnesota have a dangerous throw-in.
Allen Chapman signals a free kick to Columbus in their own half.
Lucas Zelarrayan of Columbus smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
The score after normal time is 1-1.
